components.description:
A triangle-shaped arrow, pointing down. Styled similarly to the left and right pointing triangles and colored as either gray or blue, but shown in orange on Android.

Previously displayed as red on Windows.
components.title: Down-Pointing Small Red Triangle

description:
A triangle-shaped arrow, pointing down. Styled similarly to the left and right pointing triangles and colored as either gray or blue, but shown in orange on Android.

Previously displayed as red on Windows.
title: Down-Pointing Small Red Triangle

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> User interface symbols

bn:00101752a: Being or moving lower in position or less in some value

bn:00087203v: To transfer (computer data, especially as one or more files) from a remote computer (server) to a local computer, usually via a network.
Transfer a file or program from a central computer to a smaller computer or to a computer at a remote location
Transfer data from a server to the local computer.
To transfer data from a remote computer to a local one.
To transfer a copy of a file from a remote device to a requesting device by means of a modem or network.

bn:00005896n: A mark to indicate a direction or relation
A mark to indicate a direction or relation.
A sign or symbol used to indicate a direction (e.g. \to).
